About Me

I am currently a first year at the University of Waterloo where I am currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science with co-op.

I'm an avid member of the ricing community. I am currently dual-booting Windows 10 and Manjaro Linux. You can also find my graphic design portfolio here

Offline, I take amateur pictures of nature and cityscapes, listen to music, or hang out with my friends.
